title: Denied Entry at a Temple
story: Ravi, a young man, visits a temple with his friends.
But the guard stops him, saying people from his caste are not allowed.
Ravi feels insulted and leaves silently, wondering what went wrong.
question: Which fundamental right is violated in this story?
law: Article 15: Prohibition of discrimination on grounds of religion, race, caste, sex or place of birth.

title: Arrested for a Tweet
story: Anita tweets about a recent government policy, sharing her opinion peacefully.
The next day, the police arrive at her house and arrest her without a warrant.
She is scared and confused because she only expressed her opinion online.
question: Which right is violated here?
law: Article 19(1)(a): Freedom of speech and expression.
